Types

MarkdownLexer = object
  input*: string
  current*: char
  pos*, line*, col*: int
  strbuf*: string
MarkdownTokenKind = enum
  mtkText, mtkElement, mtkCodeBlock, mtkHeading, mtkList, mtkListItem,
  mtkOListItem, mtkBlockquote, mtkHorizontalRule, mtkLink, mtkImage,
  mtkEmphasis, mtkStrong, mtkInlineCode, mtkLineBreak, mtkHtml, mtkTable,
  mtkParagraph, mtkDocument, mtkUnknown, mtkEOF
MarkdownTokenTuple = tuple[kind: MarkdownTokenKind, token: string, line: int,
                           col: int, post: int, wsno: int,
                           attrs: Option[seq[string]]]

    forbids: [].}
proc nextToken(lex: var MarkdownLexer): MarkdownTokenTuple {....raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Lex the next token from the input
